long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
EnhancedYT - Designed to enhance the user experience on the YouTube platform. The core functionality is to allow users to browse through the comment section while watching videos.

**** HOW TO USE ****
Extension will load automatically nothing needs to be done. If there comments are not desired during a playlist watch through just refresh the page.


* Live streams and playlists will remain the same.
Upcoming features:
- Volume adjusted from scroll wheel
- On / Off switch for toggling extension 

Version 1.0:
Initial release

Version 1.1:
Improved the comment section allowing sticky during scrolling
Removing any duplicate div's that may occur
CSS changed to only apply when Enhanced YouTube is working

Version 1.2: 
Related videos filter now sticky
Fixed bug comment section not showing properly when extension was not loaded
Extension now loaded without user input
YouTube shorts modified comment section
